title: Brand needs a nerf
body:
Hes too broken
Stun - aoe - skillshot - dead

replies.body: mate you are level 22, dont even try give advice hear untill you reach atleast gold

If this was Reddit I would give gold

1. Why are you on the forums on your Smurf

2. Get your plat 4 account to verify

3. If you where plat you could deal with brand

Edit: I'm gold trash and brand is easy lane easy game
No dash, no movement speed ability, and one cc which is single target and a skillshot. Sounds broken, probably need to nerf his damage to balance him I'd say.
low damage ult for 1v1 in lane compared to most other mids
Mate the skill shot is the stun, I mean you cant get stunned behind creeps and he's mana thirsty.
he thirsty for pus if you get what I mean I mean he wants {{champion:107}}
Don't think Riot is going to nerf  him until he is played in competitive levels. :3
no riven top yas mid aatrox jg garen top needs nerfs if you play safe and just farm till 6 you will win wost of the time
